import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form' import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button' import "./Registration.css" import { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import Axios from 'axios' const Registration = () => { const [email, setEmail] = useState(""); const [firstName, setFirstName] = useState("") const [lastName, setLastName] = useState("") const [dob, setDob] = useState("") const [username, setUsername] = useState("") const [password, setPassword] = useState("") const [address, setAddress] = useState("") const [phoneNumber, setPhoneNumber] = useState("") const [emergeName, setEmergeName] = useState("") const [emergePhone, setEmergePhone] = useState("") const [emergeRel, setEmergeRel] = useState("") const [hotelName, setHotelName] = useState("null") const [hotels, setHotels] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { Axios.get(`http://localhost:3001/hotels`) .then((response) => { setHotels(response.data); }); }, []) return (

Registration

Personal Information

Email Address setEmail(e.target.value)} required /> First Name setFirstName(e.target.value)} required/> Last Name setLastName(e.target.value)} required/> Date of Birth setDob(e.target.value)} required/> Username setUsername(e.target.value)} required/> Password setPassword(e.target.value)} required/> Address setAddress(e.target.value)} required/> Phone Number setPhoneNumber(e.target.value)} required/>

Emergency Contact Information

Full Name setEmergeName(e.target.value)} required/> Phone Number setEmergePhone(e.target.value)} required/> Relationship setEmergeRel(e.target.value)} required/>

Hotel Information (Optional)

Hotel Name setHotelName(e.target.value)}> {hotels.map((hotels=> ))}
) } export default Registration;
